relevant_findings.head_and_neck: NCAT, EOMI, PERRLA, No scleral icterus, mucosa moist, no LAD
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: R/R/R, S1/S2, NO M/R/G, Carotids 2+, No bruits or JVD
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: S/NT/ND. No guarding, rebound, or frank peritonitis, +BSx4
relevant_findings.incision_wounds: C/D/I, Soft, no hematoma or ecchymosis
relevant_findings.extremities: No C/C/E; Feet warm. Good perfusion
relevant_findings.neurological: Reflexes, strength, and sensation grossly intact, CNII-XII: WNL
